english.segment1: Verse 1: I caught you trippin out the back door, headsore with nothing to say to say. Where you goin what you runnin from today?. In the wrong at just the right time What's got you in its sway its sway. Ooh brother there's a price in every life to pay
english.segment2: Chorus: Behind the lies in every scene the picture's soaked in gasoline. We found the way and honestly we are no one.. We are no One
english.segment3: Verse 2: I caught you slippin on the wet floor, reaching for something to late to late. Get your grip before the levy breaks away
english.segment5: Bridge: What's wrong? what's right? who's side? who's fight? who's song? who's light?. Where you goin what you runnin from tonight?
